title: Question For Riot
body:
I'm not clear on something here. During Snowdown, there is Legendary Snowball and the Snowstorm sale as you will most likely know. I was thinking of getting Magnificent Twisted Fate during the sale and was wondering if it would count towards the Legendary Snowball. 

Thanks.
-Cardew

replies.body: I would assume so. Nothing states that you need to do anything other than end up with a legendary skin.
